nodes.text: The Personal Profit was a modified YT-1300 light freighter that was owned by the Human Chalmer Trillili. The freighter served as the flagship of the The Scourge, a small band of pirates that were led by Trillili, and during the Galactic Civil War, the Personal Profit participated in a Scourge attack on a Rebel Alliance starship in the Alluuvian system.
